attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I have an income of £11.000 pa, I will be paying an extra £ 152.10 tax pa , I do not claim income support ot tax credits, I try to be self supporting . why am I, on a low income paying extra tax? Mr Brown . You should be ashamed of your treatment of pensioners.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
